definition: the matter should not be delayed/there's no time to lose

sentences.english: Being gable to speak English is a top priority.
sentences.chinese: 學會說英語是事不宜遲。

sentences.english: Speed is desirable, must hurry to action.
sentences.chinese: 事不宜遲，必須趕緊行動。

sentences.english: Health care reform must happen this year.
sentences.chinese: 無須贅言，事不宜遲，這項改革年內一定會展開。

sentences.english: The sooner, the better. All decisions should be transparent.
sentences.chinese: 事不宜遲，且所有的決策均應公開透明。

sentences.english: We could not afford any delay and went to the big hospital immediately.
sentences.chinese: 事不宜遲，我們立刻到社區的大醫院去。
